item.title: Approaching the WLFI launch, a whale spent approximately $1.12 million to buy Block, a WLFI-related meme coin
item.description: On August 27th, as monitored by LookOnChain, with the WLFI listing time approaching in 5 days, a whale has established a new wallet '0x8C43' and spent 248 ETH (equivalent to 1.12 million USD) 6 hours ago to purchase 6.95 million units of the WLFI-related meme coin Block.

item.title: Ethereum Foundation Teams Up with Columbia University to Launch Blockchain-themed Podcast, First Episode to Air Today
item.description: On August 27th, as per official information, the Office of Academic Affairs of the Ethereum Foundation has entered into a partnership with Columbia University to launch a blockchain-themed podcast named "From Whiteboard to Mainnet." The first episode, which centers around "Optimal Dynamic Fees for Blockchain Resources," is set to premiere today.

item.title: Statistics: Suspected Four Major Addresses Colluded to Snipe XPL Hedge Positions, Profiting $46.1 Million
item.description: On August 27th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai9684xtpa), four major addresses participated in a sniper attack aimed at the $XPL hedge short position, amassing a total profit of up to $46.1 million. The leading address 0xb9c...6801e has been continuously accumulating long positions since August 24th and made a large purchase in the early morning at 05:35 today, directly sweeping the entire order book and earning a profit of $16 million in just one minute. The other three cooperating addresses started to close their positions for profit when the XPL price reached a short-term high.Analysis reveals that two of the addresses have the same source of funds, and all three major addresses obtained their margin through debridge cross-chain, exhibiting similar operational habits and demonstrating the characteristics of coordinated operation.

item.title: glassnode: Bitcoin Market Structure Shifts from Greed to Fear
item.description: On August 27th, glassnode presented its Market Weekly Report. During the past week, the Bitcoin market has witnessed significant volatility. In the spot market, the RSI indicator dropped into the oversold territory, resulting in weakened momentum and intensified cumulative selling pressure. The trading volume remained stable but lackluster, indicating insufficient buyer confidence. The open interest in futures contracts decreased, suggesting a decline in leverage. Meanwhile, the funding payments increased significantly as the long positions further extended their advantage. The options market showed a rising sense of caution. The open interest in options saw a slight increase, but the volatility skew narrowed significantly, indicating a sense of complacency in the market. At the same time, the 25 Delta skew broke upwards, highlighting traders' rush to seek downside protection to hedge against potential price drops.Various signs suggest that the market structure has shifted from being

item.title: Whale created a new wallet "0x8C43" and spent 248 $ETH($1.12M) to buy 6.95M $Block 6 hours ago.
item.description: With the $WLFI launch approaching in 5 days, the whale created a new wallet "0x8C43" and spent 248 $ETH($1.12M) to buy 6.95M $Block 6 hours ago.

item.title: A whale purchased 169,259 HYPE tokens at an average price of $47.6.
item.description: On August 27th, as monitored by OnchainLens, a whale transferred $8.06 million USDC into Hyperliquid and acquired 169,259 HYPE at a price of $47.6.

item.title: Resolv buys back 1 million tokens at an average price of $0.16
item.description: On August 27th, the DeFi protocol Resolv Foundation announced that since July 31st when the fee switch was gradually enabled, the Resolv Foundation has earned $226,000 in core protocol fees.The buyback has commenced: $170,000 of the revenue has been utilized to purchase approximately 1 million RESOLV tokens, with an average price of around $0.16 per token.

item.title: A Whale Goes Short on WLFI, Profits Over $5 Million
item.description: August 27th. According to the crypto KOL AB Kuai.Dong, "A mysterious whale named Zeta. On August 24th during the pre-market trading of WLFI, when the price was approximately 0.4, successively placed 32 short orders, shorting from $0.4 to $0.33, wagering that WLFI would continuously reach new lows. Although the current return on investment has reached 75.9% and the total account profit is $5.12 million, he has not yet closed his position yet."

item.title: Meteora has completed the final validation of Season 1 points: totaling approximately 1.2 trillion
item.description: August 27th. Meteora officially announced that the final verification of Season 1 points has been completed. The following is the specific distribution status of Season 1 points.Points for 2024: A total of 327.72365 billion points were distributed among 328,976 wallets.Points for 2025: A total of 565.36606 billion points were distributed among 287,687 wallets.Genesis Pool Points: A total of 307.71210 billion points were distributed among 24,929 wallets.

item.title: BetterBank on PulseChain has been hacked, resulting in approximately a $5 million loss.
item.description: August 27th: On PulseChain, the DeFi platform BetterBank was attacked, resulting in a loss of approximately $5 million. The attacker has converted a portion of the stolen assets into 215 ETH (about $983,000), and the current holding address is: 0xf3ba0d57129efd8111e14e78c674c7c10254acae.
